statements: SELECT * FROM SensorData;
SELECT sensor_name, location, reading_value FROM SensorData WHERE reading_value > 50;
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_name, location FROM SensorData WHERE location = 'Room 1';
SELECT sensor_id, reading_time FROM SensorData ORDER BY reading_time DESC;
SELECT AVG(reading_value) AS average_reading FROM SensorData;
SELECT * FROM SensorData WHERE location = 'Office' ORDER BY reading_time DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT sensor_name, AVG(reading_value) AS avg_reading FROM SensorData GROUP BY sensor_name HAVING AVG(reading_value) > 50 ORDER BY avg_reading DESC
SELECT DISTINCT sensor_name, location FROM SensorData WHERE reading_value > 100 ORDER BY sensor_name ASC, reading_value DESC
SELECT * FROM SensorData WHERE sensor_name LIKE '%temperature%' AND reading_time BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30' ORDER BY sensor_id
SELECT sensor_name, COUNT(*) AS reading_count FROM SensorData GROUP BY sensor_name ORDER BY reading_count DESC
SELECT * FROM sensors;
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_name FROM sensors ORDER BY sensor_name DESC;
SELECT sensor_name, sensor_type, location FROM sensors WHERE sensor_type = 'Temperature';
SELECT sensor_id, AVG(value) FROM sensor_data GROUP BY sensor_id;
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_name, location, timestamp FROM sensors WHERE location LIKE '%Room%';
SELECT sensor_name, sensor_type FROM sensors WHERE sensor_type = 'Temperature' ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT * FROM sensor_data WHERE value > 50 ORDER BY timestamp ASC LIMIT 5

SELECT sensor_name, location, value FROM sensors JOIN sensor_data ON sensors.sensor_id = sensor_data.sensor_id WHERE location = 'Kitchen' AND timestamp BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-06-30' ORDER BY timestamp DESC
SELECT MAX(value) AS max_value FROM sensor_data WHERE sensor_id = 3

SELECT sensor_name, sensor_type, AVG(value) AS average_value FROM sensors JOIN sensor_data ON sensors.sensor_id = sensor_data.sensor_id GROUP BY sensor_name, sensor_type HAVING COUNT(data_id) > 100 ORDER BY average_value DESC
SELECT * FROM sensors;
SELECT * FROM devices ORDER BY location ASC;
SELECT device_id, location, status FROM devices WHERE status = TRUE;
SELECT sensor_id, value FROM readings WHERE value > 100 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT id, device_id, timestamp, value FROM sensors WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01' AND timestamp < '2023-01-01';
SELECT * FROM sensors WHERE id = 1 LIMIT 1;
SELECT device_id, location FROM devices WHERE status = true ORDER BY device_id DESC;
SELECT sensor_id, value FROM readings WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_sensors FROM sensors;
SELECT devices.device_id, devices.location, readings.value FROM devices INNER JOIN readings ON devices.device_id = readings.sensor_id WHERE readings.value > 50;
SELECT * FROM sensors;
SELECT sensor_id, location, type FROM sensors WHERE status = TRUE;
SELECT sensor_id, location, type FROM sensors ORDER BY type ASC;
SELECT * FROM sensor_data WHERE value > 100;
SELECT sensor_id, event_type, event_timestamp FROM events WHERE event_type = 'alert';
SELECT * FROM sensors;
SELECT sensor_id, location FROM sensors WHERE status = TRUE;
SELECT sensor_id, type FROM sensors WHERE location LIKE 'Lab%';
SELECT * FROM sensor_data ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT event_id, event_type, event_timestamp FROM events WHERE event_timestamp > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY event_timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM sensors;
SELECT device_id, device_name, status FROM devices;
SELECT sensor_id, value, timestamp FROM sensor_data ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM alerts WHERE alert_type = 'High'
SELECT sensor_id, status FROM monitoring_records WHERE status = TRUE
SELECT * FROM sensors ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT device_name, location FROM devices WHERE status = TRUE;
SELECT sensor_type, value FROM sensors WHERE value > 50 AND sensor_type = 'Temperature';
SELECT device_name, location, status FROM devices WHERE location LIKE '%Office%';

SELECT s.sensor_type, sd.value, a.alert_type, a.alert_message FROM sensors s INNER JOIN sensor_data sd ON s.id = sd.sensor_id INNER JOIN alerts a ON a.sensor_id = s.id WHERE a.alert_type = 'Critical';
